summary: An elegant medieval gown sold by Radiant Raiment in 4 colors. Weight-slider compatible, works with all body types. Wedding Dress replacer version available.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][/b][/center][center][color=#c27ba0][b][i][size=6]Regal Medieval Gowns[/size][/i][/b][/color][/center][color=#c27ba0][size=4]What is this?[/size][/color]
This is a very simple mod that adds an elegant lady's dress to the game. The dress comes in 4 colors - red, blue, green, and Royal - and each can be purchased from Radiant Raiment.

[size=2][color=#c27ba0][size=4]Features[/size][/color]
[/size][list][*][size=2]Custom model and textures - everything was made from scratch![/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Custom inventory/ground model [/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Weight-slider compatible[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Works with any body type[/size]
[/*][/list]
[color=#c27ba0][size=4]Installation
[list=1][*][color=#ffffff][size=2]Download the file[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffffff][size=2]Drag and drop everything in the Data folder into your Skyrim/Data folder OR import the zip file into NMM[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffffff][size=2]???[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffffff][size=2]Profit![/size][/color]
[/*]
[/list]
Wedding Dress Replacer version[/size][/color]
This file can be used alongside the main file. It's just a texture and mesh replacer.

[color=#c27ba0][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/color]
By necessity I had to edit the leveled list for Radiant Raiment to allow these dresses to be sold in the game. If you have another mod that edits the Radiant Raiment leveled list, you will need to merge your leveled lists with Wrye Bash. It's dead easy, don't worry.
 

[color=#c27ba0][size=5]FAQ[/size][/color][color=#6aa84f]
[color=#6fa8dc][b]Q: Will you make a version to fit UNP/CBBE/etc? [/b][/color][/color]
A: No. As long as your favorite body mod doesn't edit the neck seam, these dresses will work with whatever you have.
[b]
[color=#6fa8dc]Q: Can you add a version that turns the dress into light/heavy armor?[/color][/b]
A: Come on guys....it's a velvet and silk dress.
[b]
[color=#6fa8dc]Q: What does it look like on male characters?[/color][/b]
A: Wedding clothes.
author: steelfeathers

files.name: Regal Medieval Gowns - v1.1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed file structure - can now be imported into NMM
